#summary This page tries to show you how you should look at this project.
#labels Phase-Requirements

There are a few guidelines which i followed when i developed this app, and now, as an open-source project, it would be cool if development could stay within those lines.

The superpowers of this project should reside in:
  * feedback-driven development
  * simplicity as a top priority
  * speed and energy efficiency as a top priority
